description: Both legs of Hibernian's Europa Conference League second qualifying round tie against Inter Club d'Escaldes will be broadcast live by BBC Scotland.
title: Hibernian: BBC Scotland to show both legs of Euro tie with Inter Club d'Escaldes live
title_page: Hibernian: BBC Scotland to show both legs of Euro tie with Inter Club d'Escaldes live - BBC Sport
